__TOC__

Google's Picasa is a photo management application with some intermediate-level editing features.

Google <nowiki>[[https://googleblog.blogspot.com/2012/04/spring-cleaning-in-spring.html|no longer supports Picasa for Linux]]</nowiki> since April 23, 2012.
They <nowiki>[[http://googlephotos.blogspot.com/2016/02/moving-on-from-picasa.html|dropped support]]</nowiki> for the Picasa desktop application altogether on March 15, 2016.

Some other relevant applications:

* '''<nowiki>[[https://wiki.gnome.org/Apps/Shotwell|Shotwell]]</nowiki>''' - Photo management
* '''<nowiki>[[F-Spot]]</nowiki>''' - Photo management
* '''<nowiki>[[gThumb]]</nowiki>''' - Image Viewer
* '''<nowiki>[[TheGIMP]]</nowiki>''' - Complex photo and image editing
